resources.string: FIND PERSONS WITH CONFIGURED STREET NAMES
FIND CONFIGURED STREETS OF PERSONS OLDER THAN 4
MAKE EVERYONE OLDER AND SHOW AGES
MAKE EVERYONE OLDER AND SHOW AGES AS INT STREAM
FEW LONG RUNNING IN SERIAL RELATED TASKS
FEW LONG RUNNING RELATED SERIAL AND PARALLEL TSASKS

The purpose of this activity is to understand how we could combine Rx and such common UI tasks as clicks, text editing, showing progress and so on. Also we need to take into consideration such aspects as Rx and memory/context leaking. Right now we not taking into consideration Rx and restoration of view states or background tasks on configuration changes.

The purpose of this activity is to understand how we could combine Rx and such common UI tasks as show dialogs and popup menus. Also we need to take into consideration such aspects as Rx and memory/context leaking. Right now we not taking into consideration Rx and restoration of view states or background tasks on configuration changes. And it is highly desirable to be able to incorporate all dialogs/popups stuff right into Rx chains.

The purpose of this activity is to compare 3 approaches for long running tasks (lrt) execution and to see and find the most safe and convenient from memory leaking safety point of view. For this time we taking into consideration android configuration changes but until it is necessary to demonstrate memory leak itself and how to overcome it. So, we still not taking into consideration Rx and restoration of view states or background tasks on configuration changes.\nJust push any button to start task and then rotate screen or exit activity. Repeat it few times until you see a notification from LeakCanary.
No real request will be sent. This is just a demo, you could check sources and make sure.
